mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, r.resume_no, u.user_name, r.title, u.user_gender, r.job_history, r.wish_salary, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.user_birth, CURDATE())-(RIGHT(CURDATE(), 5) < RIGHT(u.user_birth, 5)) AS user_age FROM tbl_resume r LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.offer_yn = 'Y';
